Statement.sql: CREATE TABLE TSYAU0009 ( C_CD VARCHAR2(10), LOGIN_ID VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL, SERIES VARCHAR2(100) PRIMARY KEY, TOKEN VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, LAST_USED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
SELECT LOGIN_ID, SERIES, TOKEN, LAST_USED, C_CD FROM TSYAU0009 WHERE SERIES = ?
INSERT INTO TSYAU0009 (C_CD, LOGIN_ID, SERIES, TOKEN, LAST_USED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE TSYAU0009 SET TOKEN = ?, LAST_USED = ? WHERE SERIES = ?
DELETE TSYAU0009 WHERE 1=1 AND C_CD = ? AND LOGIN_ID = ?
